DOC.brief_summary: This double blind , two-arm , parallel-group , stratified gender , randomise , control study participant age 7-10 year ( yr ) . The aim study test hypothesis MMN fortify beverage may help improve immunity outcome assess vaccine response 7-10 yr old school participant .
DOC.brief_title: A Study Investigate Impact Multiple Micronutrient ( MMN ) Beverage Powder Vaccine Response School Children
